cards.rules_text:
[i](This card is conjured and not otherwise legal.)[/i]

When Mirror Paradigm enters, conjure a card named Data-Point into your hand. [i](It's a sorcery that costs {2} with “Draw a card.”)[/i]
Once each turn, when a sorcery card is put into your graveyard from anywhere, you may copy it. If you do, you may cast the copy. [i](You still pay its costs.)[/i]
